name: Youtube no chat
description:
Disables the youtube chat.

Reason:
You may want to prevent yourself from spoilers concerning tv-shows and movies, also prevents you from seeing overall stupidity and anonimity around that place.

Why it's useful:
Using this style will prevent you from being spoiler'ed by comments. Some users even use comments like "spoilers below, beware!", so why not prevent yourself from seeing them altogether?
additional_info: Applies display: none to the comment section
